message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, Alice.
The value is decreasing Bob, let's settle this quickly.  I'll concede a bit from my initial offer.
I'll take a bit more, considering the inflation is affecting you more.
This is getting ridiculous Bob.  A 50/50 split is the only fair deal at this point.
You're losing value, I'm not. I'll take a bit more.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I need you to meet me halfway or we both lose. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll take a bit more.
